caption.p: a, b Calluses’ induction and regeneration of Trachyspermum ammi by Agrobacterium LBA4404 harboring GUS gene based on inoculation time (30s, 1, 2, 3, and 5 min) and co-cultivation (1 and 2 days). To measure each treatment, all experiments were repeated up to three times. Different letters ( a– e) specify a significant difference between treatments based on Duncan’s test at P ≤ 0.05. c, d The mean comparison of the percentage of callus induction and regeneration of T. ammi at different concentrations of kanamycin
